heading: 1 Prerequisites
text: Thiis test. Test index.html file updated.sample book written Markdown. can use anything Pandoc's Markdown supports, e.g., math equation \(^2 + b^2 = c^2\).bookdown package can installed CRAN Github:Remember Rmd file contains one one chapter, chapter defined first-level heading #.compile example PDF, need XeLaTeX. recommended install TinyTeX (includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.name/tinytex/.

heading: 2 Introduction
text:
Add somethings see changed.can label chapter section titles using {#label} , e.g., can reference Chapter 2. manually label , automatic labels anyway, e.g., Chapter ??.Figures tables captions placed figure table environments, respectively.
Figure 2.1: nice figure!
Reference figure code chunk label fig: prefix, e.g., see Figure 2.1. Similarly, can reference tables generated knitr::kable(), e.g., see Table 2.1.Table 2.1: nice table!can write citations, . example, using bookdown package (Xie 2021) sample book, built top R Markdown knitr (Xie 2015).
code:
par(mar = c(4, 4, .1, .1))
plot(pressure, type = 'b', pch = 19)
knitr::kable(
  head(iris, 20), caption = 'Here is a nice table!',
  booktabs = TRUE
)

heading: 4 Using Git and Github
text: 在 /RepTemplates 資料夾下存放我的 Repository, 每個Repository就包含1個 Project 建一個資料夾 hello

heading: 4.1 git init
text: git init 就是初始化hello這個資料夾
code:
git init
# make a file naming hello.txt
touch hello.txt
ls## 重新初始化已存在的 Git 版本庫於 /home/son/RepTemplates/R_learn/.git/
## 01-intro.Rmd
## 02-literature.Rmd
## 03-method.Rmd
## 04-application.Rmd
## 05-summary.Rmd
## 06-references.Rmd
## _book
## book.bib
## bookdown-demo_files
## bookdown-demo.log
## bookdown-demo.Rmd
## bookdown-demo.Rproj
## _bookdown_files
## _bookdown.yml
## _build.sh
## _deploy.sh
## DESCRIPTION
## Dockerfile
## docs
## hello2.txt
## hello.txt
## index.Rmd
## LICENSE
## now.json
## _output.yml
## packages.bib
## preamble.tex
## _publish.R
## README.md
## style.css
## toc.css

heading: 4.2 git status 查看目前狀態
text: git status 查看目前狀態紅色 hello.txt 代表這個檔案還沒被追蹤You can also use math footnotes like this1.approximate standard error 0.0272
code:
git status## 位於分支 main
## 您的分支與上游分支 'origin/main' 一致。
## 
## 尚未暫存以備提交的變更：
##   （使用 "git add/rm <檔案>..." 更新要提交的內容）
##   (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
## 
##  修改：     03-method.Rmd
##  修改：     04-application.Rmd
##  修改：     docs/404.html
##  修改：     docs/final-words.html
##  修改：     docs/index.html
##  修改：     docs/intro.html
##  修改：     docs/literature.html
##  刪除：     docs/reference-keys.txt
##  修改：     docs/references.html
##  修改：     docs/search.json
##  修改：     docs/search_index.json
##  修改：     docs/using-git-and-github.html
## 
## 未追蹤的檔案:
##   （使用 "git add <檔案>..." 以包含要提交的內容）
## 
##  bookdown-demo.Rmd
##  bookdown-demo.log
##  bookdown-demo_files/
##  docs/bookdown-demo.epub
##  docs/bookdown-demo.pdf
##  docs/bookdown-demo.tex
##  docs/git-and-github.html
##  hello.txt
##  hello2.txt
## 
## 修改尚未加入提交（使用 "git add" 和/或 "git commit -a"）touch hello2.txt

heading: References
text: Xie, Yihui. 2015. Dynamic Documents R Knitr. 2nd ed. Boca Raton, Florida: Chapman; Hall/CRC. http://yihui.name/knitr/.———. 2021. Bookdown: Authoring Books Technical Documents R Markdown.
